website_summaries.verdict: The best budget refractometer you can use for marine applications like salt water tanks.
pros: The refractometer’s eyepiece is large and comfortable to use in a variety of marine applications
Readings of salinity and specific gravity are possible just from a couple of drops of water
cons: Refractometer can be difficult to calibrate correctly following the included instructions

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy to use and very accurate when compared with my other one. The calibration was way off when I received it so be sure to calibrate it with RO water or calibration solution before using. It appears to be well made. The case that comes with it is very flimsy and I don't expect it to last very long, but the unit itself feels very robust.
customer_reviews.author: UncleDanDan

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: This salinity refractometer works great for what I need. The kit comes with a piece of soft cleaning cloth, 3 droppers and a screwdriver for calibration. The initial calibration is very easy. I then tested 'Imagitarium Pacific Ocean Water' bought from the store and got a reading of 1.025. While I don't have another refractometer for comparison, I feel this product is well worth the money. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. seems to be working just fine, and has a solid construction. love that is comes with three droppers, and the screwdriver to adjust it. Con: Does not come with the calibration solution to calibrate it, and isn't very clear when buying it if it did, or didn't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So much more accurate and consistant than a hydrometer. I would never recommend a hydrometer to anyone now that I have one of these. Consistency is key to a stable reef tank, and a refractometer allows you to be consistent with your water changes and monitoring of the salinity by removing the junky improperly calibrated hydrometers from that equation. What convinced me was watching BRS TV (bulk reef supply) do a example of 3 different hydro's... Each was different and each time they checked water, it was different on the same HYDRO! That = terrible for your reef!
customer_reviews.author: Hobineros

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this instead of, or to validate a hydrometer.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Couldn't be happier for salinity measurements. Needs a way to tighten eyepiece threaded adjustment as its a little loose so constantly needs adjusting each time used. I may wrap with electrical tape to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Severance

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and seems to be of quality build. Solid packaging in blue carrier box. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Once you place sample water on prism end, you must be careful how you put back the transparent cover over the sample. This could have been designed better and I had to attempt several times to get a good reading initially. However, the readings were consistent and once I got used to it, was relatively easy. Calibration was slightly off, which was very easy to adjust with given small screwdriver. Its a 4.5 stars actually with the cover being a slight issue. A very good deal for the money. (I paid less than $15, local fish store wanted $45!!) I would easily recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Naim

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product for an even greater price!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for half the price of others on the market exactly like it. I've been using this for our saltwater tank for 4 months now. Perfect results.
customer_reviews.author: corinati

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper than the big box pet stores that offer the same product. Instructions were easy to follow, and the quality of the product and the case is very nice. You do have to read results in extra bright light to be able to see clearly. My only complaint is that when I am wearing my glasses I have a hard time reading the results, I think there is a bit of a glare that makes this hard, but not the fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great - case broke right away, though.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can be a little tough to adjust the viewfinder - I still can't get it perfect. But maybe I'm blind. Otherwise, seems to give an accurate reading, and feels solidly built. The case is kinda junk, though. The clasp broke the first time I used it. Not a deal-breaker, as I just keep it near my aquarium, but if I was traveling with it, that would be an issue. Not enough of an issue to give less than 5 stars, though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: but much cheaper/lighter materials and not great for daily or even weekly usage
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for...this is very similar in design and construction to the "blue" version with blue grips and chrome finish, but much cheaper/lighter materials and not great for daily or even weekly usage. If you only need to check SG once a month or so and you're sure to take extra care of this refractometer then it's worth what you're paying and compared to the pricier models.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas K. Deuser

customer_reviews.title: Works like the ad states
customer_reviews.text: This salinity refractometer works great. I was concerned about salt content in an aquarium I set up. I used this and a PPM water quality meter to determine that my tap water would've killed the little creatures. Not a big surprise since it tastes so bad, I've been drinking R.O. filtered water for over a decade. Now my fish live in R.O. water as well
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: top quality big time
customer_reviews.text: when these ppl say professional they mean it. this item feels like a $100 test item. i can't believe it was so cheap. i was expecting some chinese junk but not, top quality. seriously, really really good. just keep in mind you need to put a drop of distilled water on it before testing to calibrate it. i calibrate before every test to make sure it is spot on. i measured my neighbor's salinity also and he was like wow that's nice. i was like heck yeah pick one up, they're a steal for $23!
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: If you are using a needle style salinity meter, read this!
customer_reviews.text: I have used refractomers like this before, only for anti freeze. They are super accurate! So I purchased one for salinity as we were having issues using the cheap, plastic needle style meters. After I calibrated it with calibration fluid, I tested our water. Imagine my shock when it tested at 1.032! I tested again with our plastic meter and it tested 1.026. I am very happy I purchased one of these and won't use another style again. It's super easy to use and read. 3 drops on the lens and look into the eye piece. You won't be unhappy if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Refractometers seem to come in two grades, one about $20 and the other about $80. I lost my expensive one so gave the cheaper option a try. It's cheaper looking but seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it's for though
customer_reviews.text: The little latch on the case broke first time I opened it, the little black rubber cap piece over the set screw wouldn't stay on and fell off the first time. I used readings from the old school style hydrometer with the little float level and compared. This read slightly different. Calibrating each time can be a pain. Good for what it's for though. Will be looking into the new digital ones.
customer_reviews.author: tz

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste ANY money on this refractometer
customer_reviews.text: This deserves ZERO stars. Do not waste ANY money on this refractometer. It is TERRIBLE!!! I have already returned mine. I purchased this al Kong with 35ppt calibration fluid, but it is impossible to calibrate this. The scale is so far off that I can't turn the calibration screw far enough to correct it. The entire thing is made from cheap plastic and is very flimsy. I will order my next refractometer from an aquarium supply store I know and trust.
customer_reviews.author: lpsouth1978

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - doesn't hold calibration
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. You have to calibrate with a standard salinity solution (not DI water) before every measurement, because it does not stay accurate. You can tell its cheap because it hardly weighs anything - I had a better quality one that felt very substantial in weight. I thought this one might be good because it costs a bit more than all the really cheap ones out there, but it isn't. I returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, not brand new
customer_reviews.text: I received in two days and opened it up and was amazed at the quality of it. I was looking it over and saw that it had some saltwater or some type of stains on the specimen glass where you apply the drops. The rest of it is great, but Im hoping the stains don't obscure the results of the test. Overall Im satisfied, but since its listed as NEW condition, I was surprised to see the stained glass. If there is a way to try to get the stain off, that would be great to know. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Stan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works well handel carefully
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and is accurate enough I felt I needed to hold it with kid gloves as the adjusting screw is a bit offset and in a plug n not sure if the crystal or bezel being offset makes any difference but I would have liked a more solid adjusting screw and a better or bigger crystal but 4 outa 5 stars great price and works well
customer_reviews.author: G!

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and came calibrated to 1.026 (verified with calibration fluid). Not much to say other than it works well and is easy to read. I like the box that came with it which helps protect it. Calibration fluid I used:
customer_reviews.author: WhiskeyCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Good working
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Needed slight calibration adjustment once received but is expected. Make sure to get calibration solution along with this item to make sure your measurements are spot on. I haven't needed to re calibrate again. I recheck the calibration weekly and it hasn't moved. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for honey testing
customer_reviews.text: This calibrated out as expected and matched others with distilled water. When testing honey, ~18% water content it will not register. This is used for honey judging and does not work as expected or against other refractometers.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quality refractometer
customer_reviews.text: This refractometer arrived packaged carefully and as described. The directions were clear and easy to follow allowing calibration with distilled water and included hardware for turning the screw. I was able to clearly read salinity levels of two of my tanks. This is a quality product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mulder

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap, but useable
customer_reviews.text: Does not calibrate like the instructions imply it should. I was ready to give up until I learned about calibration sea water, so now it seems functionable as long as I calibrate every time. Set screw cover disappeared somewhere. One screw on this item is starting to rust.
customer_reviews.author: S@HD

customer_reviews.title: don't let the price fool you priced
customer_reviews.text: I have had a another brand for years decided to get a new one . This one works very good and is easier to use than my other one . I think this is a very important tool to have for a reef tank . It has a very nice case and extra tools like a screw driver and cleaning cloth and case .
customer_reviews.author: RICK HOWARD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and super accurate.!
customer_reviews.text: Working great. Calibrate it to zero using ro/di water and go from there. Only took me a few tries to calibrate, after that super easy. Nice sturdy case but the dropper failed after a few uses. Just use a drinking straw after that. Waaaaaaay better than the floating type of tester.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Z.

customer_reviews.title: Quality with accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to test salinity in one handy kit. Even contains a small screwdriver to set ZERO scale, draw straw for taking sample and the refractometer. Adjustable focus with great scale clarity. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Workman

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I purchased for my saltwater tank..Trust you gonna needs this to get a better idea how much salt is in your tank. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Needs Readjustment
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and easy to use. My only complain is that I have to calibrate it more often than I wish I had to. I'd say at least once a month or my readings would be off.
customer_reviews.author: I. Drennan-Colón

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hydrometer. I don't see much difference between this ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hydrometer. I don't see much difference between this one and my Red Sea refractometer. Shipped for free so I won't complain about the week it basically took to get here. This same model is available with Prime as well. I went this route because some reviewers said the refractometer doesn't come with a hardshell case if you order it through Amazon Prime. It ends up costing the same you just have to wait a few extra days to get it with the case. Just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Mcresci

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't keep my saltwater tank healthy without this tool.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't keep my saltwater tank healthy without this tool. You should buy calibration solution and calibrate often but it's easy to use and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: emily a hurst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit, comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. Came with extra pipettes just in case you lose one. After initial test with distilled water, I come to find out that it was already calibrated properly. Instructions in the case was clear, I'm glad it came with a cloth to clean the prism. I would recommend this to someone for it's easy of use and clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap and loose. Works but needs some calibration. Local aquaria shop can help.
customer_reviews.text: The materials are sub par. Parts fit lose. The case is a must to protect it. This thing is low quality. For what you pay, what do you really expect. It does its job. Worth a buy if you take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Came calibrated and ready to use right out of the box. Tested with DI water and then proceeded to use for salt water. After several uses the instrument is still calibrated and working as it should. Tested and used on room temperature water +/- 15 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: never going to use anything else
customer_reviews.text: man I wish I had known about this years ago sooo much easier to use and read then those wonky little plastic bits with the gauge that sticks and you have to bang it around. couldnt take care of my salt water nano tank without it
customer_reviews.author: E. Terrosa

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully as ad advertised. The salinity readout is essy to see, and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: KitchenKutter

customer_reviews.title: By far the best to have for measuring salinity
customer_reviews.text: Save money from buying at the big box store and this does just as good or probably even better.
customer_reviews.author: JME

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple.of.months now and couldnt be easier. Cheaper than what you would find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jshelt21

customer_reviews.title: Accuracie and price
customer_reviews.text: This by far is one of the better refractor meters, I have used many in the past for my reef tank and this one is spot on. The price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me and is super accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if some are defective based on the reviews, but mine has been working perfectly and hasn't even needed calibration over 6 months now...
customer_reviews.author: JulianK

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone with a saltwater tank
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this thing will never go back to the old way of checking my salt
customer_reviews.author: mark p.engeron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to measure
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price. This is so much better to use than a floater to measure. This is accurate and simple to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krause

customer_reviews.title: IDK
customer_reviews.text: IDK about this. I dont really know if its calibrated correctly or even if my talk salt lvl just high and this is accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Sams

customer_reviews.title: Works great for saltwater mixing
customer_reviews.text: The old plastic bobber meter I used to use was very inaccurate I could measure same water 3 times and get 3 different readings with this on the other hand you get a very accurate reading with no mistake.
customer_reviews.author: JP01

customer_reviews.title: Works great very easy
customer_reviews.text: Great works perfectly and very easy to use no scratches on lenses and has a very nice case to put it in love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lantwan

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: The refractometer came and looked great! However the refractometer was defective and would not calibrate at all. I tried to contact the seller as I really need this and he never responded to my message. I was so excited for this and very disappointed when it came defective.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: needed something to measure the salinity of my brackish water tank. This worked great, and the price can't be beat. I really don't know how I kept the tank running all this time without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Needs constant calibration
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok, I have to calibrate it before each use.
customer_reviews.author: Bradusfaction

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for what we ordered it for. A ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for what we ordered it for. A bit difficult to read the lines on the inside, but holding up toward a light source when viewing should correct this for most people. Our water salinity has tested identical to what the aquarium store's refractometer says every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Results are all over the place when used for brewing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so inconsistent I can't trust it for any reading. Probably pass on this one
customer_reviews.author: John M. Lapinski

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: it works really well. A little hard to adjust for the first usage but it works really well and very accurate
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and makes checking my aquarium salinity so easy.
customer_reviews.author: MDV1981

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: To each his own, but this works great for me, I'm not one to usually post a comment unless it's just trash or a product. But this thing seems to be good quality, reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: cantMARKthat

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. I calibrated with RO water and the readings have been consistent with my apex controller probe. I did have some problems adjusting the view piece initially but managed to get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine was bad
customer_reviews.text: Mine needs calibration every time I use it. Every Single Freaking Time! Otherwise it's a nice piece of equipment, easy to read and sturdy. I just think the quality control may be a little off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Refractometer arrived with a large scratch across the daylight plate.
customer_reviews.author: aerotiy

customer_reviews.title: Best in price I have found
customer_reviews.text: Its a cool scientific way to check salinity levels but a Instant Ocean $10 salinity hygrometer works just as well.

customer_reviews.title: If this is for a saltwater tank - just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I've even tested the "needs calibration every time" statement I heard from my sw fishkeeping forums, but I've found it's pretty dead on for a few uses. It's the same price a hydrometer, but wayyyy more exact and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Riehl

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done if you know what you’re doing.
customer_reviews.text: You can tell it’s not high end by weight alone. Recalibrate it every time you use it and it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a good value and it actually works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well. The materials are a bit cheap and the eye piece that you use to focus is loose and wont stay in place. I had to add a rubber band to the threads to keep in in place. For the price it is a good value and it actually works well. After calibration it seams to hold the setting well and the scale is easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a refractometer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a refractometer. Very easy to use. Not difficult to read at all, just point the end toward a light source. I was shocked to find my hydrometer was off by 0.003!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for the money very close to the same reading as my other meter
customer_reviews.author: scott p.

customer_reviews.title: the 2nd was better still has some hazing on the lens and a ...
customer_reviews.text: had to get a replacement after the 1st one came with a glue smudge on the lens and the cover hinge pin fell out. the 2nd was better still has some hazing on the lens and a small smudge. but it works.
customer_reviews.author: phoneman101

customer_reviews.title: this product works great..
customer_reviews.text: this product works great... I did not realize that it would be coming from China on what must have been a very slow boat... I think it took close to 4-5 weeks to receive it. However the quality is great and was calibrated perfect on arrival. The box and everything with it was intact and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use and super consistent & accurate readings a definite must have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but loose
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be accurate but the adjustable eyepiece to focus is incredibly sloppy. I expected a more precise fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any saltwater hobbyist!
customer_reviews.text: Simply and easy way to detect salt levels in my aquarium. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and very accurate. Went to get my firts fish, had a .23 amd the store had the same reading on my water sample. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Y

customer_reviews.title: Good price and product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed and at a much better price then anywhere else. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Way easier and faster to read your salt level
customer_reviews.text: Way easier than using the water fill one. Few drops and you look thru it and Bam, your done!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hunawill

customer_reviews.title: Thankx guyz for carrying a wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Affordable ,accurate and on point out of box get value come s with a all needed from calibration screwdriver to hard case protection, money well spent. Thankx guyz for carrying a wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: elhijodelrio

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my arsenal of tools for my marine aquarium. Very accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David Hull

customer_reviews.title: nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I tried this with a pre measured mix of salt and water, and it worked well. I now will wait to use it with my salt water pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For a spot on accurate reading this is the ONLY way to go ...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Built well and works perfectly every time. It was super easy to calibrate and use. The only down side but not a big deal is the case. It's hard to open at times. I use this all the time to check the salt level of my aquariums.
customer_reviews.author: Traderfjp

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and does what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Symonique

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to read and calibrate, happy with mine so are my LPS corals and fish.
customer_reviews.author: Atellis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for checking water salinity experiment for school. Be sure to calibrate it first. Also, it didn’t cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works good! However, would it kill them to include a few drops of calibration fluid as part of the purchase so that you can be up and running upon receipt? I realize that you can use distilled water to calibrate, however, that is not totally accurate.
customer_reviews.author: GoNavyBeatArmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good, works as describe, I just had to calibrated with rodi water.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Id buy another one
customer_reviews.text: Seams to work great. I calibrated it per the instructions with ease. And its been doing good so far. Easy to read and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great refractometer!
customer_reviews.text: Great refractometer with a great price point. Hard case is really convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for measuring my reefs salinity when using for hyposalinity while fish are in quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: TyMaiShu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I have to take off my glasses when using the device.
customer_reviews.author: jplev

customer_reviews.title: Fishy Fishy
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses this on his 3 large fish tanks. He says it works amazing and is a true "must have" to keeping his fish alive and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine after calibrating it with distilled water
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the science fair project of my son. It worked fine after calibrating it with distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this is the worst refractometer that I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I received a dud, but this is the worst refractometer that I have ever used. Will not hold calibration for more than 30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: brian f

customer_reviews.title: If you keep saltwater aquarium, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: A quality instrument at a bargain price, precise, easy to use, well made. The only accessory you need is some distilled water to calibrate to 1.0.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love this instrument. Trust me I know about ease of use I work in a water Laboratory . Very accurate now my salinity is perfect in my saltwater aquarium
customer_reviews.author: Monty Henson

customer_reviews.title: No matter what I do with the distilled water, ...
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I do with the distilled water, it won’t calibrate to zero. I can back out on the calibration screw all the way out and the scale still reads below zero.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Lim

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Calibrated it with some tap water and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Calibrated it with some tap water and then measured my tanks salinity, comparing to another device - right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: easy to calibrate
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, easy to calibrate, seems durable. The case is durable, the only issue being the clip wanting to slip occassionaly out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Garett Kytle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic refractometer! Accurate and doesn't lose calibration!
customer_reviews.text: This refractometer is extremely accurate and doesn't lose its calibration like some others in the market. For those of you who don't know, you shouldn't even bother wasting your time with a hydrometer. Spend the money on a decent refractometer. Salinity levels are too important to the health of your tank and everything in it for you to forego accurate measurement. I promise this product is worth the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: MadisonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I cant believe O paid over $100.00 for one of these 10 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Robin Scott Thorn

customer_reviews.title: I found it does a great job when testing water for my salt water tank
customer_reviews.text: After using distilled water to calibrate it, I found it does a great job when testing water for my salt water tank.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Item said it was going to come with a screwdriver and a droplet pen both was missing. Wonder if it was used and returned but I will keep it because returning the item will be more of a hassle!!! Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RODI water is enough to calibrate.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok good value for money, it is annoying sometimes calibrate it once a day before use but plus point is you don't need calibration solutions RODI water is enough to calibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Check the Calibration
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just check the calibration before testing you salinity. Mine was off by +0.005 and had to recalibrate, other than that it’s worming great
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I’m working on a brackish water study of alligators and this little instrument works like a charm. Accurate readings in a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert S. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate as far as salinity. But is advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate as far as salinity. But for those confused by description like I was it does not read temperature but way more accurate than a hydrometer. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: C. DiCiccio

product_meta.title: Professional Automatic Temperature Compensation Salinity Refractometer for Aquariums, Marine Monitoring, Saltwater Testing.Dual Sacle: 0-100ppt & 1.000-1.070 Specific Gravity
